code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const slides=[{id:1,title:'Quality Notes',subtitle:'Semester-wise curated notes',bg:'#e3f2fd'},{id:2,title:'Previous Question Papers',subtitle:'Practice with past papers',bg:'#fce4ec'},{id:3,title:'Tutorials & Guides',subtitle:'Study tips & exam strategies',bg:'#e8f5e9'},{id:4,title:'Internship Resources',subtitle:'Apply & prepare for internships',bg:'#fff3e0'}];export default function BannerSlider(){const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const t=setInterval(()=>setIndex(i=>(i+1)%slides.length),6000);return()=>clearInterval(t);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"banner-slider",children:[slides.map((s,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slide ".concat(i===index?'active':''),style:{background:s.bg},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slide-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:s.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:s.subtitle})]})},s.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slider-dots",children:slides.map((_,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dot ".concat(i===index?'active':''),onClick:()=>setIndex(i),"aria-label":"Go to slide ".concat(i+1)},i))})]});}
